Author: yellowposy2
Text: Hi! I’m on a recovery ~journey~ and I really understand where you’re at. Something really helpful a therapist told me in treatment is that recovery can seem really scary because it might feel like losing control. However, it’s not- it’s taking control from the ED, and that’s new and hard and scary but you are absolutely capable of it. Sending you love and support 💓

Author: earlgreytease
Text: there’s nothing weak about eating, and recovery is NOT failure. your ED is not who you are and if it continues to take over your life, you will never be living it to it’s fullest. i’ve been ping ponging between recovery and relapse for about two months and i can honestly say i feel so much better when i’m in recovery mode; it’s only when i’m in the worst of mental states that i’m drawn to starvation again. please be strong. i know it’s so hard but you absolutely have it in you ❤️
